resources.string: Application needs CAMERA_PERMISSION in order to capture image. Please allow permission.
Please enable CAMERA_PERMISSION. Go to \nSettings -> Apps -> Permission

Tap a box to start organizing
Gather your family\'s information in one place.
Involve everyone in building the complete picture.
Take better decisions with access to collective information, anywhere, anytime
Feel comfortable knowing you have full control on a secure platform you can trust.

● Choose a strong password, with at least
	○ eight characters
	○ one uppercase letter
	○ one lowercase letter
	○ one number
	○ one symbol(!, @, #, $, etc)
Provides additional security - prevents unauthorized access to your account if others use your device

With NineBx, all your data, whether at rest or in transit, is fully encrypted and cannot be read by anyone other than you. Your data is encrypted and decrypted only at the device level, and only on your authorized device, so only you can see it.

Your data is secured using military-grade AES 256-bit encryption with PBKDF2 key derivation with 10,000 iterations. This makes it effectively impossible for anyone to decrypt your data without knowledge of your Master Password.
Only you have the key to your data
All encryption and decryption of data requires knowledge of the Master Password which only you as the user know.

For your security, the Master Password is never stored on our servers and is never transmitted over the internet. Given this added security measure, NineBx is not able to help you access your data if you ever happen to forget your Master Password.
In addition to confirming your Master Password, NineBx security requires you to authenticate any new device you use with a time-based one-time password (OTP) that is sent to your registered email.

For added security, the app is locked whenever it is pushed to the background on your device. Unlocking it requires you to enter a 6-digit Personal Passcode for NineBx that you create at Sign Up. For your convenience, you can enable Touch ID so you do not have to key in this passcode every time.
NineBx servers are hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS), widely considered to be one of the most secure and reliable cloud platforms in the industry.
1 user, cloud backup and 5 GB file storage
Up to 3 users, cloud backup and 10GB file storage
Up to 5 users, cloud backup and 20GB file storage
Secure access on unlimited devices with cloud sync
Ability to track modifications to records
Ability to add records for non-users(ex.minors, pets
Ability to push files into NineBx from email/photo gallery
Comprehensive search across nine boxes, calendar, and lists
Quick-fill using voice, pre-populated options, location search
Access to intuitive, pre-defined folders across all nine boxes
Secure and convenient Touch ID login
Can easily become one of my top 4-5 apps.
I might use some of the features
I see no use for it.
Overall how useful did you find
Very intutive - I always knew where I was
It was a naze - I got lost a number of times.
Loved the look - made me want to engage
Quite ordinary - didn\'t grab my attention
Thank you for trying out NineBx! Please let us know what you thought...
